# Aims

The aims of the thesis were to estimate the impact of PHiD-CV10 on various facets of pneumococcal disease, associated healthcare burden, and cost:

i. The incidence of paediatric emergency department visits for otitis media with treatment failure (Paper I)
ii. The incidence of otitis media visits to primary care (Paper II)
iii. The incidence of outpatient antimicrobial prescriptions (Paper III)
iv. The incidence of tymapnostomy tube procedures (Paper IV)
v. The incidence of hospitalizations for respiratory and invasive infections commonly associated with *Streptococcus pneumoniae* (Paper V)
vi. Incidence of pneumococcal disease in all age-groups and cost-benefit analysis  (Paper VI)
